name: Gladius Games
description:
We at Bone Idle Games Studios are happy to release our first official game Gladius Games! We want to let your inner toddler out by letting your smash, crash and bash giant mecha together in a chaotic and wildly fun pick up and play fighter! 

  • The game includes a full narrative story mode to explore the crazy world of the not to distant future! 
  • Local VS mode between your friends or an AI
  • Stylised artwork 
  • Music to get stuck in your head
